// Generated by Balance.tmpl using ProcessTemplates.go


new entry "TavernBrawler"
type "PassiveData"
using "TavernBrawler"
data "Boosts" " IF(IsMeleeUnarmedAttack()):RollBonus(Attack, max(0,StrengthModifier));IF(IsMeleeUnarmedAttack()):CharacterUnarmedDamage(max(0,StrengthModifier));IF(IsRangedUnarmedAttack()):RollBonus(Attack, max(0,StrengthModifier));IF(IsRangedUnarmedAttack() and not HasStatus('SG_Polymorph_BeastShape',context.Source)):DamageBonus(max(0,StrengthModifier));IF(IsUnarmedWildshape() and IsUnarmedAttack()):DamageBonus(max(0,StrengthModifier))"
data "StatsFunctorContext" ""
data "Conditions" ""
data "StatsFunctors" ""
data "StatsFunctorContext" "OnAttack"
data "Conditions" "(IsRangedUnarmedAttack() or SpellId('Throw_ImprovisedWeapon') or SpellId('Throw_ImprovisedWeaponBerserker')) and HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Hit)"
data "StatsFunctors" "StrengthModifier"
